00006 #include "Point.h"
00007 #include "Promotion.h"
00008 #include "libSerialize.h"
00009 template <class PRECISION>
00010 class PointOf<2,PRECISION>
00011 {
00012 public:
00013         PRECISION m_xX;
00014         PRECISION m_xY;
00015 
00016         typedef PRECISION type_precision;
00017         static const int type_dimensionality = 2;
00018 
00019 public:
00020         PointOf(const PRECISION* vx){
00021                 m_xX=vx[0];
00022                 m_xY=vx[1];
00023         }
00024 
00025         template <class PRECISION2>
00026         PointOf(const PRECISION2& x){
00027                 m_xX=x;
00028                 m_xY=x;
00029         }
00030 
00031         PointOf()
00032         {
00033         }
00034 
00035         
00036         template<int DIMENSIONALITY2,class PRECISION2>
00037         PointOf(const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY2,PRECISION2>& pt)
00038         {
00039                 if (DIMENSIONALITY2>=1){
00040                         m_xX=pt.Dim(0);
00041                 }
00042                 if (DIMENSIONALITY2>=2){
00043                         m_xY=pt.Dim(1);
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 
00047         template<int DIMENSIONALITY2,class PRECISION2>
00048         PointOf<2,PRECISION>& operator=(
00049                 const PointOf<DIMENSIONALITY2,PRECISION2> &pt
00050         )
00051         {
00052                 if (DIMENSIONALITY2>=1){
00053                         m_xX=pt.Dim(0);
00054                 }
00055                 if (DIMENSIONALITY2>=2){
00056                         m_xY=pt.Dim(1);
00057                 }
00058                 return *this;
00059         }
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063         String Describe() const
00064         {
00065                 return String("(") +  m_xX + ", " +  m_xY + ")";
00066         }
00067 
00068 
00069         template <class OTHERPRECISION>
00070         PointOf(const PointOf<2,OTHERPRECISION> &pt){
00071                 m_xX=pt.m_xX;
00072                 m_xY=pt.m_xY;
00073         }
00074 
00075         const PRECISION& Dim(int n) const{
00076                 return (n==0)?m_xX:m_xY;
00077         }
00078         PRECISION& Dim(int n) {
00079                 return (n==0)?m_xX:m_xY;
00080         }
00081 
00082         PRECISION CVolume() const{
00083                 return m_xX*m_xY;
00084         }
00085 
00086         PointOf<2,PRECISION>& AdvanceLoop(
00087                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& ptBy=1
00088         ){
00089                 m_xX+=ptBy.m_xX;
00090                 return *this;
00091         }
00092 
00093         bool StillLooping(
00094                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& ptTo=0,
00095                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& ptFrom=0,
00096                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION>& ptBy=1
00097         ){
00098                 if (m_xX<ptTo.X()){
00099                         return true;
00100                 }
00101 
00102                 if (m_xY+ptBy.m_xY<ptTo.Y()){
00103                         m_xX=ptFrom.m_xX;
00104                         m_xY+=ptBy.m_xY;
00105                         return true;
00106                 }
00107 
00108                 return false;
00109         }
00110 
00111         PointOf(PRECISION xX, PRECISION xY){
00112                 m_xX=xX;
00113                 m_xY=xY;
00114         }
00115 
00116         const PRECISION& X() const {return m_xX;}
00117         const PRECISION& Y() const {return m_xY;}
00118 
00119         PRECISION& X() {return m_xX;}
00120         PRECISION& Y() {return m_xY;}
00121 
00122         PointOf<2,PRECISION> Bound(
00123                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION> &ptMin,
00124                 const PointOf<2,PRECISION> &ptMax
00125         ) const {
00126                 return PointOf<2,PRECISION>(
00127 			::Bound(X(),ptMin.X(),ptMax.X()),
00128                         ::Bound(Y(),ptMin.Y(),ptMax.Y())
00129                 );
00130         }
00131 
00132 
00133         int MaxDimension() const
00134         {
00135                 return (m_xX > m_xY)?0:1;
00136         }
00137 
00138         int MinDimension() const
00139         {
00140                 return (m_xX < m_xY)?0:1;
00141         }
00142 
00143         operator PointOf<2,Real>() const;
00144 
00145         static String SerializationId()
00146         {
00147                 return "Point2D";
00148         }
00149 
00150         void Serialize(Stream& st) const
00151         { 
00152 		::Serialize(st,m_xX);
00153 		::Serialize(st,m_xY);
00154         }
00155 
00156         void Deserialize(Stream& st)
00157         {
00158 		::Deserialize(st,m_xX);
00159 		::Deserialize(st,m_xY);
00160         }
00161 
00162 };

00169 typedef PointOf<2,Real> Point2DReal;

00176 inline Point2DReal::operator Point2DReal() const
00177 {
00178         return *this;
00179 }
00180 
00181 template<>
00182 inline Point2D::operator Point2DReal() const
00183 {
00184         return Point2DReal(Real(m_xX), Real(m_xY));
00185 }

00190 template<class PRECISION>
00191 inline PointOf<2,PRECISION> NewRandomPoint(
00192         const PointOf<2,PRECISION> &pt
00193 )
00194 {
00195         return PointOf<2,PRECISION> (
00196                 Random(PRECISION(0),pt.X()),
00197                 Random(PRECISION(0),pt.Y())
00198         );
00199 }

00205 //============================================================================
00206 // create (point x point) operators
00207 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00208 //============================================================================
00209 #define POINT2D_OPERATOR(Op)                                                                                                                                                                            \
00210         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00211         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,PointOf<2,T2> >::type operator Op (   \
00212                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                                                                      \
00213         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00214         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00215                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,PointOf<2,T2> >::type(                        \
00216                         pt1.X() Op pt2.X(),pt1.Y() Op pt2.Y()                                                                                                                   \
00217                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00218         }
00219 
00220 POINT2D_OPERATOR(+);
00221 POINT2D_OPERATOR(-);
00222 POINT2D_OPERATOR(*);
00223 POINT2D_OPERATOR(/);

00227 //============================================================================
00228 // create (point x point) operators
00229 // where x is {+=,-=,*=,/=}
00230 //============================================================================
00231 #define POINT2D_SELFOPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                                               \
00232         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00233         inline PointOf<2,T1> operator _op (                                                                                                                                             \
00234                 PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                                                                                            \
00235         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00236         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00237                 pt1.X() _op pt2.X();                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00238                 pt1.Y() _op pt2.Y();                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00239                 return pt1;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     \
00240         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00241 
00242 POINT2D_SELFOPERATOR(+=);
00243 POINT2D_SELFOPERATOR(*=);
00244 POINT2D_SELFOPERATOR(-=);
00245 POINT2D_SELFOPERATOR(/=);
00246

00248 //============================================================================
00249 // create (point x scalar) operators
00250 // where x is {+=,-=,*=,/=}
00251 //============================================================================
00252 #define POINT2D_SELFSCALAROPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                 \
00253         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00254         inline PointOf<2,T1> operator _op (                                                                                                                                             \
00255                 PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                                                                \
00256         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00257         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00258                 pt1.X() _op t2;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00259                 pt1.Y() _op t2;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00260                 return pt1;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     \
00261         }

00270 //============================================================================
00271 // create (point x scalar) and (scalar x point) operators
00272 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00273 //============================================================================
00274 #define POINT2D_SCALAROPERATOR(Op)                                                                                                                                      \
00275         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00276         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,T2 >::type operator Op (      \
00277                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                  \
00278         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00279         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00280                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,T2 >::type(                                                   \
00281                         pt1.X() Op t2,pt1.Y() Op t2                                                                                                                                             \
00282                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00283         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00284         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00285         inline typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<2,T2> >::type operator Op (      \
00286                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                                                                                                  \
00287         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00288         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00289                 return typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<2,T2> >::type(                                                   \
00290                         t1 Op pt2.X(),t1 Op pt2.Y()                                                                                                                                             \
00291                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00292         }

00302 //============================================================================
00303 // create (point x point) operators
00304 // where x is {<,<=,>,>=,==,!=}
00305 //============================================================================
00306 #define POINT2D_COMPARATOR(_op,_opCombine)                                                      \
00307         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                   \
00308         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                                              \
00309                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2      \
00310         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00311         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00312                 return (                                                                                                                                                                                \
00313                         pt1.X() _op pt2.X()                                                                                                                             \
00314                         _opCombine pt1.Y() _op pt2.Y()                                                                          \
00315                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00316         }
00317 
00318 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(<,||);
00319 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(<=,||);
00320 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(>,||);
00321 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(>=,||);
00322 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(!=,||);
00323 POINT2D_COMPARATOR(==,&&);

00327 // where x is {<,<=,>,>=,==,!=}
00328 //============================================================================
00329 #define POINT2D_SCALARCOMPARATOR(_op,_opCombine)        \
00330         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                           \
00331         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                      \
00332                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1,const T2& t2                                   \
00333         )                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00334         {                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00335                 return (                                                                                                                                                        \
00336                         pt1.X() _op t2                                                                                                                  \
00337                         _opCombine pt1.Y() _op t2                                                                               \
00338                 );                                                                                                                                                                              \
00339         }                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00340         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                           \
00341         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                      \
00342                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                          \
00343         )                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00344         {                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00345                 return (                                                                                                                                                        \
00346                         t1 _op pt2.X()                                                                                                                  \
00347                         _opCombine t1 _op pt2.Y()                                                                               \
00348                 );                                                                                                                                                                              \
00349         }

00361 //============================================================================
00362 // create (point x point) operators
00363 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00364 //============================================================================
00365 #define POINT2D_FUNCTION(_fxn)                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00366         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                                           \
00367         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,PointOf<2,T2> >::type                                                         \
00368         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \
00369                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                                                                                              \
00370         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00371         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00372                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,PointOf<2,T2> >::type(                                                \
00373                         _fxn(pt1.X(), pt2.X()), _fxn(pt1.Y(), pt2.Y())                                                                                                  \
00374                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              \
00375         }

00381 //============================================================================
00382 // create (point x scalar) and (scalar x point) operators
00383 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00384 //============================================================================
00385 #define POINT2D_SCALARFUNCTION(_fxn)                                                                                                                            \
00386         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00387         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,T2 >::type                                                            \
00388         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00389                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                  \
00390         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00391         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00392                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<2,T1>,T2 >::type(                                                   \
00393                         _fxn(pt1.X(), t2) , _fxn(pt1.Y(), t2)                                                                                                   \
00394                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00395         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00396         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00397         inline typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<2,T2> >::type                                                            \
00398         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00399                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<2,T2>& pt2                                                                                                  \
00400         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00401         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00402                 return typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<2,T2> >::type(                                                   \
00403                         _fxn(t1, pt2.X()), _fxn(t1, pt2.Y())                                                                                                    \
00404                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00405         }

00411 // create (point x scalar) and (scalar x point) operators
00412 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00413 //============================================================================
00414 #define POINT2D_SOLOFUNCTION(_fxn)                                                                                                                                      \
00415         template <class T1>                                                                                                                                                                                             \
00416         inline PointOf<2,T1>                                                                                                                                                                                    \
00417         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00418                 const PointOf<2,T1>& pt1                                                                                                                                                                \
00419         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00420         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00421                 return PointOf<2,T1>(                                                                                                                                                                           \
00422                         _fxn(pt1.X()) , _fxn(pt1.Y())                                                                                                                                   \
00423                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00424         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
